summary: hey friend what's your favourite dnp video? 1 with the 2 of them, 1 of phils, 1 of dans. Favourite jack video? Mark video? And...
question: hey friend what's your favourite dnp video? 1 with the 2 of them, 1 of phils, 1 of dans. Favourite jack video? Mark video? And why?😊
answer: My favorite dan video is the University one I have a cooking degree so I just find it funny that he burned pasta my favorite Phil video is all of his five Random things video because that’s so me I find the randomness thing when I’m cleaning that I don’t remember buying till I find them my favorite video of them together is all the pinof’s because the Second Pinof was how I found them it’s just special to me my favorite jack video is goodbye with Anit I don’t know how to explain it I just Connect with him and my favorite Mark video is the first five nights at Freddy’s because it was the only thing I could sit and watch with my sister besides cosplay videos

reblog.comment: My favorite dan video is the University one I have a cooking degree so I just find it funny that he burned pasta my favorite Phil video is all of his five Random things video because that’s so me I find the randomness thing when I’m cleaning that I don’t remember buying till I find them my favorite video of them together is all the pinof’s because the Second Pinof was how I found them it’s just special to me my favorite jack video is goodbye with Anit I don’t know how to explain it I just Connect with him and my favorite Mark video is the first five nights at Freddy’s because it was the only thing I could sit and watch with my sister besides cosplay videos

summary: i leave for a day, comeback and y'all are talking about how phil's content sucks and how dan doesn't want to come back to...
body:
i leave for a day, comeback and y'all are talking about how phil’s content sucks and how dan doesn’t want to come back to YouTube.

i have two questions for y'all:

is it really that hard to understand that phil lester is a grown ass adult and that he’s doing content he likes which is what he is allowed to do?

do you people even listen to dan at all? y'all hands are at his neck for not uploading yet you ‘preach’ everyday that it’s okay that he doesn’t because he needs to feel passionate about what he does. pick a side or sit down and shut up.

summary:
So, today is my phanniversary! Yayyy 
Exactly two years ago I started watching their videos and I'm so damn grateful I did cause...
body:
So, today is my phanniversary! Yayyy

Exactly two years ago I started watching their videos and I’m so damn grateful I did cause they really changed my life for better, their advice, their encouraging and good messages helped me go through a lot of stuff these last two years…I just love them sm and I’m so happy I found them..thank you D&P for making me smile when I think it’s impossible for me to do so… Thank you for helping me believe things do get better and dreams can come true (I could keep writing but this is already too cheesy and lame lol byeee)

Notes are really appreciated - if you repost please give me credits =)
